description.value:
Upgraded to integrate into Astartes Power Armour. Allows adhering to exterior hull plating or other metallic surfaces. Can be activated or de-activated at the start of the wearer's turn. Halves Agility Bonus for the purposes of movement whilst enabled.

Effect: Initiated

Notes: 3 R
